edge: The actor Hrithik Roshan was nominated for the Best Actor award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.

node_2: manoj muntashir and b. a. fida
edge: The writers Manoj Muntashir and B. A. Fida were nominated for the Best Dialogue award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
The composer Sam C. S. was nominated for the Best Background Score award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
The cinematographer P. S. Vinod was nominated for the Best Cinematography award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
The production designer Durga Prasad Mahapatra was nominated for the Best Production Design award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
The sound designer Leslie Fernandes was nominated for the Best Sound Design award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
The action director Parvez Shaikh won the Best Action award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
The choreographer Ganesh Hegde was nominated for the Best Choreography award at the 68th Filmfare Awards.
